Description: Plays and sounds great, has minor cosmetic issues as to be expected from an 80's guitar. A few dings and chips in the paint in the typical spots, but not nearly as bad as most 30+ year old flying V's. Has a warp in the black plastic pickguard, only noticeable if you look at it from the side for the most part. Bridge was already very clean and no parts are siezed or locked up. Missing the whammy bar, the black plastic pickup ring for the bridge pickup, and one out of the 3 locking nuts and screw. FREE SHIPPING to the lower 48 states as well! No hardware is available, but this guitar will be packaged extremely secure for battle! ------------------------------------------------------- If you use 'Buy It Now'- please place payment immediately in order to secure the item. Title: Hondo Formula 1 flying V with Kahler, set neck, Randy Rhoads RRV style, awesome

NameValueList.Name: Modification Description
Value: Looks like the pickups may have been changed at some point. Everything else, besides maybe some screws, appears to be original.

ConditionDescription: Plays and sounds great, has minor cosmetic issues as to be expected from an 80's guitar. A few dings and chips in the paint in the typical spots, but not nearly as bad as most 30+ year old flying V's. Has a warp in the black plastic pickguard, only noticeable if you look at it from the side for the most part. Bridge was already very clean and no parts are siezed or locked up.
